net.openhft.chronicle.engine.api.query

Interface IndexQuery<V>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.openhft.chronicle.wire.Marshallable, net.openhft.chronicle.wire.ReadMarshallable, net.openhft.chronicle.wire.WriteMarshallable, net.openhft.chronicle.wire.WriteValue
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VanillaIndexQuery

    public interface IndexQuery<V>
extends net.openhft.chronicle.wire.Marshallable
    Author:
    Rob Austin.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FROM_END
      send the snapshot that is collected from all the data in the current roll cycle if you have just restarted, no data will be return until internally all the data in the current roll cycle has been read and added to the internal map
      static int FROM_START
      replay data from the start of the current roll cycle, the start of today

    • Field Detail

      • FROM_END

        static final int FROM_END
        send the snapshot that is collected from all the data in the current roll cycle if you have just restarted, no data will be return until internally all the data in the current roll cycle has been read and added to the internal map

        static final int FROM_START

    • Method Detail

      • bootstrap

        boolean bootstrap()
        Returns:
        if true the latest update for the roll cycle ( for example day ) , is provided, the latest update is determined using the KeyedMarshallable, if false, not snapshot is return
